Description:
Accountant - Events & AdvertisingRoles and ResponsibilitiesHIRING an Accountant for our client who is a full-fledged integrated advertisement agency with an international presence capable of delivering mid- to large-scale events, content creation, and film production.Handle full spectrum of financial and cost accounting role eg. AR, AP, GL, forecasting, budgeting etc .
Responsible for day-to-day finance and accounts operations.
Perform full set of accounts and ensure timely closing of accounts.
Creating events briefs and regular planning with the events team and communication with the client.
Assisting the Business Development team with research on potential clients.
Management with the creative team on deadlines and priority of projects.
Responsible for timely monthly consolidated financial statements, payments, cash-flow management reporting for submission to the head of finance.
Review & approve payment vouchers & journal entries.
Perform cash flow forecasting, budgeting and working closely with the operations and project teams in analysing margins, variances and cost analysis.
Issue project cost reports for review and approval.
Develop and maintain internal control and effective accounting system and policies for the set up.Skills
Skills:
Bachelors in Finance or Accounting Discipline with a minimum of 2 years of experience in Events/Advertising or service industry in an Accounting role.
Should be a Saudi National
Candidate must be based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
Strong English communication skills
Demonstrate intermediate to advanced skills and knowledge of Excel, as well as other Microsoft Office applications
